I am unit testing Agents with Jade (http://jade.cselt.it/).  Starting 
and =
shutting the platform and is very expensive.  It's on the order of 
a minut=
e or two to start the platform.  Before I run my unit tests, I 
want to sta=
rt the platform and when they are all done, I want to shut 
it down.  This =
is easy to do if I only have one test method in my test 
case.  I can just =
put the startup code in the setup method and the 
shutdown code in the tear=
 down.  Unfortnately, if I have more than one 
method in the test case this=
 happens before and after each method.  If 
I have 10 test methods, the uni=
t test could take 20 minutes instead of 
just 3 minutes.  Is there a way to=
 start the platform, run all of the 
tests in the TestCase, and then shut d=
own the platform?  Thanks.



Jay
